name: Delivery Note → Sales Invoice → Payment Entry

steps.name: Inventory User: Create and Submit Delivery Note
Text Total Stock Value is visible
Fill Items in Delivery Note Based on Sales Order
Click on "Sales Order" option in context menu
Fill SAL-ORD-2026-00001 Name into search field
Click on "Yes" in the modal window
Accounting User: Create and Submit Sales Invoice
Fill Items in Sales Invoice Based on Sales Order
Click on "Sales Order" option in context menu
Fill SAL-ORD-2026-00001 Name into search field
Click on "Yes" in the modal window
Accounting User: Create and Submit Payment Entry
Open existing Quotation by Document Name:
Create Payment Entry for current Sales Invoice
Click on "Yes" in the modal window
Assert Sales Order status, delivery_status and billing_status
Sales Order delivery_status should be "Fully Delivered"
Sales Order billing_status should be "Fully Billed"

labels.name: titlePath
labels.value: > chromium > specs/e2e/sales.flow.spec.ts > Sales Process: Quotation → Sales Order → Procurement → Shipment → Accounting @sales

labels.name: subSuite
labels.value: Sales Process: Quotation → Sales Order → Procurement → Shipment → Accounting @sales
